Interestingly, it didn't even occur to me until I saw the side-by-side drawing and photo to include the style of table cloth or plate! My brain focused on the number of pepperoni slices and their position upon the pizza, assuming the rest of the pizza is a standard shape that didn't need remembering. I'd make a bad AI algorithm, but this taught me a lot about how I learn!
